title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare and Civil Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare and Civil Law 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (Part 2) (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (part 2) (commencement) order 2024

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2024” means the Social Welfare and Civil Law
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2024” means the Social Welfare and Civil Law 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024).
text_norm: 2 order act 2024 mean social welfare civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (no 6 2024)

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. The 4th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
3. The 4th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 

provisions of the Act of 2024 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 3 to 7; 

(b) paragraph (a) of section 8(1); 

(c) 

subsection (2) of section 8; 

(d) paragraph (b) of section 8(1), for the purpose of the following 

payments: 

(i) 

jobseeker’s allowance (other than jobseeker’s allowance 
payable in accordance with section 148A); 

(ii) 

farm assist.
text_norm: 3 4th day june 2024 appointed day following provision act 2024 shall come operation (a) section 3 7 (b) paragraph (a) section 8(1) (c) subsection (2) section 8 (d) paragraph (b) section 8(1) purpose following payment (i) jobseeker allowance (other jobseeker allowance payable accordance section 148a) (ii) farm assist

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 4. The 5th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which paragraph (b)
text_raw:
4. The 5th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which paragraph (b) 
of section 8(1) of the Act of 2024 shall come into operation for the purpose of 
disability allowance.
text_norm: 4 5th day june 2024 appointed day paragraph (b) section 8(1) act 2024 shall come operation purpose disability allowance

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 5. The 6th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
5. The 6th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 

provisions of the Act of 2024 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

paragraph (b) of section 8(1) for the purpose of jobseeker’s 
allowance payable in accordance with section 148A; 

(b) paragraphs (d) and (e) of section 8(1); 

(c) 

paragraph (f) of section 8(1) for the purpose of the following 
payments: 

(i) 

one-parent family payment (other than in respect of a 
widow, a widower or a surviving civil partner); 

 (ii) carer’s allowance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [263] 3

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 6 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of Part 2 of the Social Welfare and 
Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024. 

The purpose of Part 2 is to change the means tests for social welfare payments 
so that child maintenance payments will no longer be assessed as means and to 
remove the liable relatives provisions from the social welfare code. 

 
 
 
 [263] 5
